Somerville.The Middle East (nightclub): The Middle East is a live music and dining complex consisting of five adjacent venues in the Central Square area of Cambridge, Massachusetts. Its three dedicated concert spaces, Upstairs, Downstairs, and Sonia, sit alongside ZuZu and The Corner, two restaurant–bars which also host live music. Having featured a huge variety of musicians since 1987, the establishment, with its separate concert venues, "is the nexus of metro Boston's rock-club scene for local and touring bands", according to Boston Phoenix newspaper.
